statements: SELECT * FROM potential_fraudsters;
SELECT customer_name, total_transactions FROM potential_fraudsters ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT customer_name, avg_transaction_amount FROM potential_fraudsters WHERE avg_transaction_amount > 500;
SELECT customer_name, last_transaction_date FROM potential_fraudsters ORDER BY last_transaction_date ASC;

SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_transactions, avg_transaction_amount, last_transaction_date FROM potential_fraudsters WHERE total_transactions > 100 AND avg_transaction_amount < 500 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_transactions FROM potential_fraudsters WHERE avg_transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT * FROM potential_fraudsters WHERE total_transactions BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY last_transaction_date ASC
SELECT customer_name, total_transactions, avg_transaction_amount FROM potential_fraudsters WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY avg_transaction_amount DESC

SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_transactions, avg_transaction_amount, last_transaction_date FROM potential_fraudsters WHERE total_transactions > 200 AND avg_transaction_amount < 5000 ORDER BY last_transaction_date DESC, avg_transaction_amount ASC
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_transactions, avg_transaction_amount, last_transaction_date FROM potential_fraudsters WHERE last_transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY customer_id ASC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM fraudsters;
SELECT first_name, last_name, dob FROM fraudsters WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM fraudsters ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' AND transaction_amount > 500;
SELECT customer_id, activity_date, description FROM suspicious_activity;
SELECT * FROM fraudsters WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT first_name, last_name, account_balance FROM fraudsters WHERE account_balance > 1000.00;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activity WHERE activity_type = 'fraudulent' AND description LIKE '%stolen%' ORDER BY activity_date;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, address FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT customer_name, email, transaction_date, amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id
SELECT customer_id, flag_type, flag_reason FROM flags WHERE flagged_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT customers.customer_name, alerts.alert_type, alerts.alert_message FROM customers JOIN flags ON customers.customer_id = flags.customer_id JOIN alerts ON flags.flag_id = alerts.flag_id
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, name, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT alert_id, alert_message, alert_date FROM alerts WHERE alert_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM customers LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT c.name, t.transaction_amount, t.transaction_date FROM customers c INNER JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE t.transaction_amount > 1000;

SELECT a.alert_id, c.name, t.transaction_amount, a.alert_message FROM alerts a JOIN customers c ON a.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN transactions t ON a.transaction_id = t.transaction_id WHERE t.transaction_type = 'refund' ORDER BY a.alert_date DESC;
SELECT activity_id, customer_id, activity_date, activity_type FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_type IN ('Unauthorized Access', 'Phishing') ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
